tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price FLOAT NOT NULL,
    close_price FLOAT NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE statistical_analysis (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    mean_price FLOAT NOT NULL,
    standard_deviation FLOAT NOT NULL,
    skewness FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_market_data (
  datetime TIMESTAMP,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  open_price FLOAT,
  close_price FLOAT,
  high_price FLOAT,
  low_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE statistical_analysis (
  date DATE,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  mean_value FLOAT,
  standard_deviation FLOAT,
  z_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_market_data ( 
    date DATE, 
    symbol VARCHAR, 
    open_price DECIMAL, 
    close_price DECIMAL, 
    high_price DECIMAL, 
    low_price DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE statistical_analysis ( 
    id INT, 
    symbol VARCHAR, 
    mean DECIMAL, 
    std_dev DECIMAL, 
    skewness DECIMAL, 
    kurtosis DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment ( 
    id INT, 
    symbol VARCHAR, 
    beta DECIMAL, 
    alpha DECIMAL, 
    r_squared DECIMAL, 
    volatility DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE portfolio_management ( 
    portfolio_id INT, 
    symbol VARCHAR, 
    allocation DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE client_transactions ( 
    transaction_id INT, 
    date DATE, 
    symbol VARCHAR, 
    action VARCHAR, 
    quantity INT, 
    price DECIMAL 
)
